Label: Respondent sequence number
Target: Both males and females 6 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Ever told you have Hepatitis B?
Comment: Has a doctor or other health professional ever told {you/SP} that {you have/s/he/SP has} Hepatitis B? (Hepatitis is a form of liver disease. Hepatitis B is an infection of the liver from the Hepatitis B virus (HBV).)
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY 'YOU' AND 'YOU HAVE'. IF SP AGE = 12-15 OR >=16 AND PROXY INTERVIEW, DISPLAY 'SP' AND 'S/HE HAS'. IF SP AGE = 6-11, DISPLAY 'YOU' AND 'SP HAS'.INTERVIEWER: DO NOT ACCEPT SELF-DIAGNOSED OR DIAGNOSED BY A PERSON WHO IS NOT A DOCTOR OR OTHER HEALTH PROFESSIONAL.
Target: Both males and females 6 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Ever prescribed meds treat Hepatitis B?
Comment: Please look at the drugs on this card that are prescribed for Hepatitis B. {Were you/Was/s/he/SP} ever prescribed any medicine to treat Hepatitis B?

Target: Both males and females 6 YEARS - 150 YEARS
